dct_title_s: Afridsning paa Fiorden og Öen Arguim som en Fransk Stÿrmand haver tegnet
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially and depths by bathymetric soundings.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale statement: Maalestav af Franske Mile.
Shows coastline, topography, shoals, anchoring points (indicated with anchor icons).
Appears in Prévost's L'Histoire generale des voyages.
